summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Ordinance 114810 relating to and prescribing fees for boiler, building, refrigeration, electrical, elevator, energy, gas piping, grading, mechanical, pressure vessel, signs, housing inspections, master use permits and land use approvals and other certificates and permits required by ordinance, and for the furnishing of certain services and material; defining offenses and providing penalties and amending Seattle Municipal code Chapter 22.900.
